alert.note: Alert for Mahoning (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 3:33AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Mahoning County through 430 AM EDT... At 333 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Alliance, or 12 miles southeast of Ravenna, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Youngstown, Salem, Columbiana, Boardman, Alliance, Campbell, Canfield, Sebring, Austintown, Struthers, Poland, Ellsworth, New Middletown, Craig Beach, Lowellville, Beloit, North Jackson, Berlin Center, Maple Ridge and Greenford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
